thread.title: Feds, states, others oppose Patriot Coal reorganization plan

title: Feds, states, others oppose Patriot Coal reorganization plan
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Business - Today 
Patriot Coal's latest reorganization plan is drawing opposition from the federal government, regulators in four states, creditors and others...
